about_the_game:
The adventure world is full of peril, with every race sensing the approaching danger. As the remaining human commander, to resist the impending war and protect the last shelter, you need to fight together with girls from other races...

■ Crisis Breaks Out, Oasis Alliance Established

As the legend has it, there is a scholar named Sybil, residing in Adventure City. She discovered a dead ancient parasite by the altar of a mysterious forest ruin. She extracted a rare "Abyss Virus" that not only accelerates biological gene evolution but also grants immense vitality.

A famous CEO, Carter, founded the Snow Mountain Biotech Company in hopes of reviving his daughter. So he hired Sybil as an executive to start researching the "Abyss Virus."

In his desperation to revive his daughter, Carter began secret human trials. During one experiment, the virus leak occurred, infecting staff and experimental subjects. Then, the virus spread to cities and plunged the entire world into crisis.

From then on, the crisis broke out, causing a sharp decline in human population. The surviving humans established the "Oasis Alliance", building bases to cope with the crisis and erecting high walls to protect humanity.

■ Four Races, United Counterattack

The wealthy humans, who revere .technology. and knowledge, have chosen to augment their bodies with machinery, transforming themselves into the Mechanics, wielding absolute command within their base. They oppress a faction of kind, justice-seeking humans known as the New Humans. With dwindling resources, the conflict between these two factions continues to intensify.

Deep within the forest, the primal Beastfolk struggle for survival. Driven by a belief in natural harmony, they have emerged to stand against the crisis.

Meanwhile, the malicious Evolved relentlessly assault the high walls. In response, the Oasis Alliance has enacted laws allowing some Beastfolk and a few rare, benevolent Evolved to join the Oasis base, strengthening their forces to counter the Evolved threat.

■ Gene Research, Resistance Against the Evolved

Sybil, leveraging resources from the Snow Mountain Biotechn, has transformed an abandoned research facility in the mountains into a shelter to gather gene samples for advanced virus research.

The Oasis Alliance dispatches the adventurous girl Tsukuyomi and her team to investigate the shelter. However, they are trapped by the enemy, forced to defend themselves within the shelter’s walls.

Amid this crisis, the player—Commander, defeats the enemy unexpectedly, earning the respect of the girls, who appoint him as the Chief Commander of the shelter. Deciding to stay, the Commander helps them collect the gene .meier. samples needed by the Oasis Alliance for virus immunity research.

From this point forward, the Commander begins to rewrite history…

The world of adventure teeters on the brink of disaster, but a new life is about to unfold. Are you ready to lead these girls on a thrilling journey, Commander?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

‌‌Developer's Words: Creating the World of 'Anime Girls' on Steam‌

Hello, everyone. It's an honor to have this opportunity to share with you the behind-the-scenes story of our game, 'Anime Girls', which has recently been released on Steam. As the developer of this game, I'm thrilled to see how it has resonated with so many players around the world. Today, I'd like to take you on a journey through the development process, share our inspirations, challenges, and the love we've poured into this project.

‌The Inspiration Behind 'Anime Girls'‌

The idea for 'Anime Girls' sprouted from a deep-seated admiration for the vibrant and diverse world of anime. For those who are unfamiliar, anime is a unique art form that originated in Japan, characterized by its distinctive visual style, compelling storytelling, and rich character development. Over the years, anime has evolved into a global phenomenon, captivating audiences with its ability to transport viewers into fantastical worlds filled with adventure, romance, comedy, and more.

As a lifelong fan of anime, I've always been fascinated by the intricate details of character design, the emotional depth of  .black myth. storytelling, and the sheer creativity that goes into crafting each episode. I wanted to create a game that would allow players to immerse themselves in this enchanting world, experiencing the joy of interacting with their favorite .avowed. anime characters in a whole new way.

‌The Vision for the Game‌

From the outset, our vision for 'Anime Girls' was to create a game that would be both visually stunning and emotionally engaging. We wanted to capture the essence of anime, not just in terms of its visual style, but also in the way it tells .ARK. stories and connects with its audience.

We knew that we wanted to create a game that would appeal to both seasoned anime fans and newcomers to the genre. To achieve this, we focused on crafting a .thunder. narrative that would be accessible and enjoyable for everyone, while also incorporating elements that would delight die-hard fans.

‌The Development Process‌

The development process for 'Anime Girls' was a labor of love, filled with countless hours of planning, designing, coding, and testing. Our small but dedicated team worked tirelessly to bring this game to life, pouring our hearts and souls into every aspect of its creation.

One of the biggest challenges we faced was capturing the essence of anime in a game format. Anime is a medium that thrives on movement and expression, and we wanted to ensure that our game would accurately reflect these elements. To achieve this, we worked closely with talented artists and animators to create fluid, lifelike animations and expressive character designs.

Another challenge was creating a game that would be engaging and enjoyable for players of all skill levels. We wanted to make sure that 'Anime Girls' would be accessible to casual gamers, while also providing enough depth and challenge for more experienced players. To strike this balance, we incorporated a variety of gameplay modes, including story-driven quests, competitive battles, and social features that encourage interaction and collaboration.

‌The Characters of 'Anime Girls'‌

Of course, no anime-inspired game would be complete without a cast of memorable characters. We spent a great deal of time and effort crafting a diverse group of characters, each with their own unique .baldur. backgrounds, personalities, and motivations.

Each character has their own story to tell, and we've taken great care to ensure that their .dayz. interactions with Yuna and each other are both meaningful and engaging. We hope that players will grow to love these characters as much as we do and that they'll be motivated to explore the game's .Civilization. world and uncover its secrets.

‌The Future of 'Anime Girls'‌

Now that 'Anime Girls' has been released on .Steam., we're excited to see how players will respond to our game. We've already received some incredibly positive feedback, and it's been heartwarming to see how much players are enjoying the .destiny. game.

However, we're not content to rest on our laurels. We have a roadmap of updates and new content planned for 'Anime Girls', including new .wukong. characters, storylines, and gameplay features. We're committed to supporting the game and ensuring that it continues to evolve and improve over time.

We're also eager to hear feedback from the community. We believe that the best games are those that are constantly evolving and adapting to the needs and desires of their players. If you have any suggestions or feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We're always listening and eager to make 'Anime Girls' the best game it can be.

‌Thank You‌

In closing, I'd like to take a moment to thank everyone who has supported 'Anime Girls' thus far. Your enthusiasm and encouragement have been a constant source of inspiration for us, and we're grateful for the opportunity to share our game with you.

Creating 'Anime Girls' has been an incredible journey, and we're excited to see where it will take us in the future. We hope that you'll join us on this adventure and become a part of the 'Anime Girls' community. Together, we can create a game that celebrates the magic of anime and brings joy to players around the world.

Thank you for your time, and we hope to see you in the game!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz / AMD Radeon HD 6750M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750ti 4G / AMD Redeon RX550
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz / AMD Radeon HD 6750M
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6G / AMD Redeon RX 580 2304SP
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750ti 4G
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6G
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Enjoy an epic adventure with cute girls in an Anime RPG world!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
